entry.title: Ispalla Incense Peru
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ispalla
Type: Incense
Price: 2.75 - 125.00 (11 variants)

NEW! Ispalla Incense Sticks from Peru

The energies of northern Peru are fused in incense sticks of Palo Santo to form a pleasant and relaxing aroma that cleanses the energies of every corner of your home or office. It is ideal to use in Yoga, Reiki and meditation practices as it will help to relax the mind and reduce stress.

Ispalla incenses are made with the highest quality of resins to offer a unique and relaxing experience. There are no chemical components in its preparation, each person who lights an Ispalla incense will be enjoying the unique aromas of Peru.

entry.title: Papier d'Armenie
entry.summary:
Vendor: Papier d'Armenie
Type: Incense
Price: 4.00 - 20.00 (4 variants)

Known worldwide as the most ancient natural room deodorizer; since 1885.

 Made from natural ingredients such as benzoin and incense.

Created to perfume your home and eliminate unpleasant odors such as frying, tobacco, cat litter, bathroom or dampness. Bring it with you on your travels : car, vacation home, hotel room.

The absorbent paper used to manufacture Papier d’Arménie® is certified by the Forest Stewardship Council, an independent international organisation to promote the responsible management of the world's forests.

Papier d’Arménie can also be used without burning it to deodorize wardrobes or drawers. Each booklet has 36 pre-cut paper strips, in twelve sheets of 3.

Ceramic holder comes in assorted colours. It has a triangular base with sides of 14.5cm & Dome 8cm in diameter.

entry.title: Triloka Angel Series Incense Sticks
entry.summary:
Vendor: Triloka
Type: Incense
Price: 3.25 - 260.00 (9 variants)

A beautiful series of Incense Sticks connected to the Angels. This incense is formulated to open our hearts and minds to the energy, message and power of the angels. Handmade according to ancient tradition and supports an age old cottage industry. 100% natural botanicals, blended with fragrant wood powders, seeds, roots, leaves, gums, herbs, essential oils and resins.

10 sticks per pack   -Assorted has 7 sticks individually wrapped

Price: 8.00 - 11.50 (3 variants)

An ideal companion for meditation and quiet reflection, to scent a large room, or even for outdoor gatherings.
Thicker 13” long sticks/ Burns 2 hr/stick. 30 sticks.

Sitting Zen (sandalwood, clove, cinnamon, spices)

Morning Zen (sandalwood, cinnamon, benzoin, spices)

Evening Zen (sandalwood,clove, patchouli, benzoin, spices)

Price: 4.60

These 2 fragrances inspired by the phases of the moon, blended from aromatic woods, natural herbs and spices.

35 sticks, Burns 30 min/stick.

Tranquility/Crescent Moon (sandalwood, cedar wood, spices)

Creativity/New Moon (cinnamon, clove, spices)

Kyoto Moon Display (holds 30 units, 15 of Tranquility & 15 Creativity as Abundance/Full Moon has been discontinued) Please contact for details.

entry.title: Shoyeido Incense - Traditional Daily Series
entry.summary:
Vendor: Shoyeido
Type: Incense
Price: 2.90 - 175.00 (10 variants)

Eight timeless natural fragrances blended for everyday enjoyment. Twenty to fifty natural ingredients are combined in precise proportions to create these soothing and evocative scents.

Burns 50 min/stick. 30 sticks

Kyoto Autumn Leaves (sandalwood, clove, patchouli, benzoin, spices)

Kyoto Cherry Blossoms (sandalwood, cinnamon, benzoin, clove)

Eternal Treasure (sandalwood, clove, cinnamon, spices)

Five Hills (sandalwood, patchouli, cloves, spices)

Golden Pavilion (sandalwood, clove, patchouli, benzoin, spices)

Great Origin (sandalwood, cinnamon, camphor, spices)

Moss Garden (sandalwood, benzoin, patchouli, spices)

White Cloud (sandalwood, clove, camphor, spices)

Daily Incense Sturdy Cardboard Display - 5 units of 6 scents (no White Cloud or Five Hills)  $95.00

Daily Incense Sturdy Cardboard Display - 5 units of all 8 scents  $175.00

s:variant.title: Cardboard Display (6 scents, no White Cloud or Five Hills)

entry.title: Shoyeido - The Jewel Series
entry.summary:
Vendor: Shoyeido
Type: Incense
Price: 3.80 - 114.00 (6 variants)

Shoyeido created the Jewel Series to evoke the spirits of five precious stones, each a symbol of humanity's greatest inner qualities: Diamond for power. Ruby for strength. Emerald for awareness. Sapphire for devotion. Amethyst for balance. Each fragrance is blended from only the finest aromatic woods, herbs, roots, resins and spices.

Burns 30 min/stick. 30 sticks.

Diamond-Power (sandalwood, ginger lily, frankincense, cinnamon)

Ruby-Strength (cinnamon, patchouli, saussurea sandalwood, spices)

Emerald-Awareness (sandalwood, fennel, clove cinnamon, spices)

Sapphire-Devotion (sandalwood, vetiver, clove benzoin, spices)

Amethyst-Balance (sandalwood, cinnamon saussurea (aroma like violets) spices)

Sturdy Cardboard Display (30 units/6 of each)

entry.title: Shoyeido - The Angelic Series
entry.summary:
Vendor: Shoyeido
Type: Incense
Price: 4.60 - 138.00 (6 variants)

Shoyeido's expert incense blenders began working on a new incense series - to capture the essences of some of humankind's highest ideals - our heart’s greatest desires - as pure fragrance.

Their transcendent outcome was the Angelic Series of incenses: five idyllic fragrances embodying the spirits of Inspiration, Peace, Hope, Joy, and Love. Each fragrance is blended from only the finest aromatic woods, herbs, roots, resins and spices.

Burns 30 min/stick. 30 sticks

Inspiration (sandalwood and exotic spices)

Peace (myrrh, sandalwood, clove and spices)

Hope (sandalwood, frankincense, ginger lily, spices)

Joy (tea leaves, sandalwood, clove, vanilla, spices)

Love (benzoin, sandalwood, balsam tolu, spices)

Cardboard display (30 units/6 of each)
